875e5766-8281-422a-a388-d2db924b2bae: After the wearer uses Following!, the wearer's allies gain a +33% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on their next attack for each ally within a 2-cell radius from the wearer.
6a7d849a-cd36-4f2f-a331-0a044e9ce188: All allies in a 2-cell radius around the wearer gain a +40% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} from the {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}Unyielding Beacon{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} instead of the original bonus.
2a27436e-c230-4633-b6f1-8fee59ff001a: At the beginning of combat, the wearer gets the Medikit and Onslaught {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, which reproduce the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of the medikit and onslaught consumables, costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Each of these abilities can only be used once per combat.
f3ebac01-1e82-49ce-b551-85086e68824e:
At the start of the combat, the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (5) on themselves.
Whenever the wearer performs an area {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they inflict bleeding (3) on all {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} creatures.
This area melee attack also deals +<u>(5 × wearer's bleeding level)</u>(% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
921506f0-519a-41ca-979f-677241b70332: At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
1916f805-ca7b-4064-bdc7-af186e8a3373: Each time the wearer uses a major {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} lose 30% of their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
74b33d0c-431f-4a12-bda0-b4991c4b6c7b:
Every time the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, they restore <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15% critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}</indent>
c5cadf4c-0631-4d1c-a3e8-29680f265f22: Grant +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and +<u>(4 × (AGI {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} rank))</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
463f0e4d-67c4-4157-ad73-1bbd5b0c906d: If the wearer didn't spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and gain immunity to the forced movement effects until the end of the wearer's next turn.
17a63059-59cc-4389-b716-eac530a8096d: If the wearer didn't spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} in half-cover until the end of the wearer's next turn.
92aaafb1-c4a3-41d6-83b0-260205b237ad: If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons equipped in both hands, their Slash {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} makes an additional melee attack with the secondary weapon.
27972811-03a3-4aac-b97c-e3a7127177e9: Increase the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by +5 and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} by +10.
c8b84c78-9fa6-41d7-869b-1c9cfd293754:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer is always {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} but immune to the {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.
Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −<u>(5 × Heretical rank)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If passed, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 turn instead.
2d7af0e6-da3a-4ec1-92f8-9ec618c2dab4: The power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer is increased by +1 for each enemy affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.
aff0885c-459a-499f-a3ff-2fc9dfb26ce6: The wearer and adjacent allies cannot fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and become immune to forced movement effects.
a9e0c12a-9941-4fa4-8d88-881d78601db9: The wearer becomes immune to the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effects.
f635974d-202e-4d7f-a3b5-f72089fdd97c:
The wearer can move through cells adjacent to enemies spending the normal amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.
Also, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} each time they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
b536c46f-0fe1-48e1-9669-daf4dab07d82:
The wearer can't suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} by walking over the burning cells.
The wearer inflicts +3 additional stacks of burning whenever they stand on burning cells.
a451bd55-e67e-4dd6-b820-069fd0c72876:
The wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} in the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat. Their movement cost is not reduced by threatening areas.
Also, the wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this round.
f8b779e3-4b4e-409d-871a-2d09416f7f2d:
The wearer gains +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} when using swords.
Whenever the wearer parries with a sword, they immediately counter attack, causing the attacking enemy to become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.
If the attacker is staggered, the wearer's parry is increased by +<u>(5 × AGI bonus)</u>%.
87f23f23-880e-4fd6-8f3d-d6d364254992: The wearer gains +(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} × 2)% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against enemies under the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} of Expose Weakness.
6367fd38-c343-459c-8d83-181eb42fce54: The wearer gains <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each enemy affected by their psy-power or psyker staff attack. Stacks.
b6a6a67c-5ecb-4156-bc7e-939fb375452c: The wearer gains a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies who have no adjacent allies. The {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of the wearer's Dash and Charge {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is increased by +1 cell.
02429699-37ad-4d27-a363-dbe91bb80f7b: The wearer of these boots gains +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and re-rolls failed {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.
67a5f598-1966-46f1-9dcd-31b450de6500: The wearer of these boots gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} while wearing a light {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
219f761a-0bc2-4959-a223-b7ecd63943a3: The wearer raises {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} to 175 whenever they kill 5 enemies in a row in one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
d412df9c-25af-47c6-8e2d-aeecc2eff433: These boots grant their wearer +3% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat for each psy power they use. Stacks.
0540a4d2-3ca9-4f5f-b84c-a09c64774ecd: These boots grant their wearer +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. Collision {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} caused by the wearer is increased by +<u>(TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u>.
5e968f8f-9143-49b1-89f8-e5b231fbb901: These boots grant their wearer a +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} reduction {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for attacks with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.
6819558b-85ed-4f5e-8b67-7b9763541ad9:
When in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the wearer has 100% cover efficiency against {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} but never {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} them. Also, they suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from area attacks.
Whenever the wearer uses a grenade and it {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} at least 3 enemies at once for the first time in combat, this action does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
0466ed59-365b-45dc-9ad3-3782e8159019: When the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer for the first time during the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, and this attack does not count toward their attack limit. The wearer then becomes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
790ca25d-61a2-446c-aee9-303f8a7a6a3a:
Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer for the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
913a324d-4f33-4bdb-a821-ed83ed0eff62:
Whenever the wearer attacks an enemy behind {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, cover efficiency is decreased by −40% for that attack.
<indent=5%>−15 {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g}</indent>
a01cfe50-468f-4a6b-88de-f21669dab70c:
Whenever the wearer chooses an ally as the target of their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer immediately gains +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
The targeted ally gains +<u>(wearer's FEL bonus / 2)</u> MP at the start of this ally's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
344d737b-6eb9-4173-a7f7-0f8c95072363: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, the wearer has a 25% chance to gain 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
4590d678-2bad-4aeb-b498-ac4be448ff4e:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal 1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to each adjacent creature and to the wearer themselves.
The wearer also deals an additional +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} rank</u> warp {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.
a8258159-f1c0-4fa6-acae-faaeea25fb37: Whenever the wearer kills 2 or more enemies with a single attack, the attack doesn't spend all of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
d262d194-ec45-4d71-8166-9717ff2e496c: Whenever the wearer moves through a cell occupied by an enemy, the wearer gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against that enemy's attacks until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
7faf7db1-a5ff-4141-9efd-a1551b3b1a5b: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, they recover all their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
19eaff6b-24ec-4240-8a50-f8a15e2145d2: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, the target of the melee attack should pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or get knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
9ef4328a-0c31-4da0-b612-591e751fc6f1: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack from any {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, this attack gains +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} / 4)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
66c183ef-453c-4cf7-8eff-489b24d1a0dc:
Whenever the wearer performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they instantly provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from all adjacent enemies.
The wearer gains +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each attack of opportunity provoked by an area attack.
1338c026-3372-4f59-9d29-0bc2170a1d34: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.
f948ee67-35f1-4213-9e58-e3f01f8dd1ca: Whenever the wearer uses a consumable item, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
5fc409be-7565-43d8-b57c-10ff62deddb6: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} with the Charge, Slash, or Danse Macabre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) on the target.
47f3be50-13b9-4834-942b-e5c284d0162f: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, they immediately strike back at the attacker. If this attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer performs Kick to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the enemy away.
27e12390-57ef-4189-be79-46918141a8c2: Whenever the wearer's Hot on the Trail {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is triggered, the wearer gains + 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
8fe4c86b-d252-4f81-907c-0165733ee7b3: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer, the wearer gains the Kick {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} to use until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
fbc7b63a-8d7f-4725-9ae1-5ec8bacebc6a: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reach 0, the wearer deals <u>maximum MP</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.
